extendedInfo.description: Citrix Receiver lets you access your enterprise files, applications, and desktops to help you be as productive on the go as you are in the office. If your company uses Citrix, you have the freedom to work on your favorite device from wherever you are. Just ask your IT department how to get started.What you can do with Citrix Receiver:Experience simple, consistent, and delightful file and app access from all of your devicesSecurely share files with anyoneIf your company doesnât use Citrix yet, you can install Receiver and see what it's like by using the demo - http://citrixcloud.net.For more information about Citrix Receiver, visit http://citrix.com/receiver.If youâre looking for an app to connect to your Mac or PC, try GoToMyPC, the secure remote access app from Citrix.

reviews.title: Nexus 10
reviews.comment: Works really well, zooming working well, would prefer to be able to configure resolution... Backspace still not working!
reviews.author: Michael Hall

reviews.title: Bloatware
reviews.comment: I don\'t need, want, or use this product. Please allow me to delete from my phone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does not work!
reviews.comment: I\'ve been relying on this app to remotely access my work computer for the past few months and is now returning an error stating \"Could not connect. Please try again.\" This is extremely frustrating. Please fix ASAP!
reviews.author: Ogden Roja

reviews.title: Works well
reviews.comment: Using via web gateway. No issues, just wish it would bring up my phone\'s keyboard when I am in a text entry field in the remote Windows desktop. But no biggie with triple tap. Nice app!
reviews.author: John Kim

reviews.title: Good enough
reviews.comment: The UI needs work but it works reliably with my company\'s infrastructure without too much hassle.
reviews.author: Nick Jones

reviews.title: Superior access
reviews.comment: For those IT proffesionals who want to deliver inhouse software to all kinds of environments ..thats the tool to use...been using it more than 6 years...never regreted turning to this technology
reviews.author: Chris Tz

reviews.title: Not bad at all!
reviews.comment: Works fine on moto droid 4.
reviews.author: Nathan Newsad

reviews.title: Won\'t work.
reviews.comment: Despite typing in the exact same info as all of my coworkers, and numerous people trying to get it to work, citrix won\'t allow me to log in on any mobile device.
reviews.author: Steve Williams

reviews.title: Completely useless
reviews.comment: Took forever to get a version that finally worked. Then had it on my phone for a good long while and never needed it.  Tested it finally again prior to a trip and everything was finally working.  Then they pushed another update rendering it useless again.  Garbage.
reviews.author: Cary Andres

reviews.title: Excellent App
reviews.comment: I use this app on my iPad mini, iPad 2, laptop, and my Android Rezound.  It works great. I really find the functionality great. I has only one snag... When I movesy virtual mouse below the keyboard -  could not get the mouse to come back up. Apart from that, is useful and easy to use.
reviews.author: Michael Tan

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Works like a dream!
reviews.author: James Marks

reviews.title: Works great galaxy note 2
reviews.comment: Use it daily in a hospital environment for reseting passwords, accessing emr systems
reviews.author: William atwood

reviews.title: Nexus 10 Delete Button Issue
reviews.comment: The app works very well, but there is one issue. The delete button doesn\'t work which means that it is very hard to use. This is on Android 4.2.2. I have tested this on other devices and it works fine.  Please can you fix?
reviews.author: Dave Smith

reviews.title: Chances are you don\'t have a choice about using this app
reviews.comment: Because either it it locked on your device or your corporate environment requires you to use it. Either way, be prepared for a poorly designed experience. Problems with right mouse clicks exiting the app, outlook breaking, etc.
reviews.author: Brian Watson

reviews.comment: Disgusting bloatware; my phone needs to be freeeeee!
reviews.author: Kevin Aguilar

reviews.title: Works now .. Finally!!!
reviews.comment: I always had issues with setting up accounts .. But looks like finally it is working.. Still have minor issues after changing passwords.  Apart from that it works great!
reviews.author: Dinesh Loganathan

reviews.title: Would be Excellent if...
reviews.comment: It didn\'t kick me out every time when multitasking. Quite annoying.
reviews.author: Dusti Tornay

reviews.title: Could not connect.
reviews.comment: Most of the time I get the dreaded \"Could not connect\" error.   Connection is pretty solid if it actually goes through.  Stuck using this app for work stuff.   Samsung Galaxy Note Android 4.0.4 (ICS)
reviews.author: Michael Takahashi

reviews.title: Work From Home works for me...
reviews.comment: Nice App...
reviews.author: Albin Jose

reviews.title: Very limited use
reviews.comment: Could be made lots better
reviews.author: tex everett
